manpage.author: Brian Langenberger
manpage.name: edits existing metadata files
manpage.title: Metadata Editor
manpage.description: editxmcd can edit existing MusicBrain XML or FreeDB XMCD files. It does not perform MusicBrainz or FreeDB lookups.

options.option: show a list of options and exit
the MusicBrainz XML or FreeDB XMCD file to edit
